intent_atoms.description: Implement Task E3 using the documented schema, adding versioned model loading and migration tests for the CoreData store.
Session persistence implementation must be documented in DocC articles and manuals to describe workspace restoration flows.

functional_units.name: CoreData Migration Plan Documentation
functional_units.description: Provides a documented plan for migrating CoreData schema including extensions, workflow, testing impact and dependencies.

functional_units.name: Versioned CoreData Model Scaffolding for Annotations and Bookmarks
functional_units.description: Enables loading of specific model versions for annotations and bookmarks, allowing seeding of additional entities without rewriting the store initializer.

functional_units.name: CoreData Entity Definitions (Workspace, Session, SessionFile, WindowLayout, SessionBookmarkDiff)
functional_units.description: Defines new CoreData entities that extend existing stores while preserving lightweight migration paths.

functional_units.name: Fallback Strategies and Manual Recovery Tooling for Linux Builds
functional_units.description: Provides fallback mechanisms and tools to recover from migration failures on Linux builds before session persistence features ship.

functional_units.name: CoreData Store Migration Tests
functional_units.description: Tests that verify versioned model loading and migration of the CoreData store.

functional_units.name: DocC Articles and Manuals Update for Session Persistence
functional_units.description: Updates documentation to describe workspace restoration flows once session persistence is implemented.
